New Records: Shohei Ohtani tied Ichiro Suzuki for the most stolen bases in a season by a Japanese-born player with his 56th steal
Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr.'s 448-foot home run tied the game 3-3 in the fifth inning
Shohei Ohtani's two-strike single in the sixth inning scored the go-ahead run and stole second
Michael Kopech earned his 15th save with a crucial strikeout in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers were one win away from clinching the NL West with a magic number of two
The Padres were on a five-game winning streak before the loss
Post-Match Reflections: Fernando Tatis Jr. expressed confidence in the Padres' playoff push
Dodgers manager Dave Roberts highlighted the significance of the win and praised Blake Treinen's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game had a sellout crowd of 52,310
Shohei Ohtani's stolen base tied him with Ichiro Suzuki for the most steals in a season
Others: Dodgers shortstop Miguel Rojas left the game with left groin tightness and will have an MRI
